Package com.servers.application

Class AppServerDriver

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.servers.application.AppServerDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AppServerDriver
extends java.lang.Thread
A websocket connection that has been established. handles the message and decides what to do with the messages received
